Name: Fiesta
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
30 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: With the right amount of quality pomegranate syrup, this is a great drink.
Nutrition: One serving of Fiesta contains 186 calories
